casebody.data:
McCLELLAND
v.
DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS. No. 479P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Dept. of Corrections, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of November 2004 by Plaintiff for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
